      Returns an object of type SongTableView.
      Parameters:
      Repository - the TableView of the songs
      album2 - column for albums of the songs
      indx - column for indexes of the songs
      anno2 - column for years of the songs
      autore2 - column for authors of the songs
      durata2 - column for durations of the songs
      titolo2 - column for titles of the songs
